sent.orig: Various size of towel include hand towel, face towel bath towel, blanket, and cleaning towel.
sent.trans: 毛巾的尺寸包含手巾，面巾，浴巾和毯子等。

sent.orig: Shoe Polisher, Stamp Mate, Wet Towel, Animal Towel Emf Tester, Ceramic Heater Towels.
sent.trans: 采购产品鞋油，捺印配偶，湿手巾，动物手巾，陶瓷的热水器手巾。

sent.orig: HJ738M towel rapier loom is the towel weaving machine designed and produced subtly by our manufacturer.
sent.trans: HJ738M毛巾机HJ738M型毛巾剑杆织机是我厂经过精心设计和精心制造的毛巾织造设备。

sent.orig: She hung her towel on the towel rail.
sent.trans: 她把毛巾挂在毛巾架上。

sent.orig: "A towel,'she scolded herself. "At least a towel; I could have done that for him."
sent.trans: “一条毛巾，”她自责的说，“至少一条毛巾，我这点总可以为他做的。”
